title: Name an Xbox Protagonist Besides Master Chief - Game Showdown
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

The penultimate episode before the finale! Let's see who will reign victorious between Greg, Andy, and Tim! 

Season 2 Episode 15.
